creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: landscape with trees and mountains: cluster of trees, shrubs and rocks at LL with small open structure at center of grouping; taller pine rises toward center; mountains at center with waterfall at L; shorter, grey, cone-shaped mountains at R; inscription at URQ
inscription: 飛瀑寒溪石出長松；露梅雲重林裏半窓半開天邊数片釼峰
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio：月青三滕; URQ, square intaglio：玉峰山人; URQ, square intaglio：福原素子絢印; sticker with relief seal at R when rolled; marks when rolled, blue ink: F Gogaku LS;
signed: 五岳寫並題（wrote and painted by Gogaku)
title: Flying Waterfall and Cold Stream
